      static interface  PermissionRequester.ResultListener

    • Method Detail

      • hasPermission

        public boolean hasPermission(java.lang.String permission)
        Checks if the user has allowed the specified permission
        Parameters:
        permission - the Manifest.permission to check
        Returns:
        true if the user has granted access to the permission. Otherwise false

      • requestPermission

        public void requestPermission(java.lang.String... permissions)
                       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Requests the specified list of permissions
        Parameters:
        permissions - a list of permission to ask the user for
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - the illegal argument exception

      • setResultListener

        public void setResultListener(PermissionRequester.ResultListener resultListener)
        Sets the callback listener that will recieve the permission prompt results
        Parameters:
        resultListener - the ResultListener to notify of the permission prompt result

      • onPermissionResult

        public void onPermissionResult(int requestCode,
                               java.lang.String[] permissions,
                               int[] grantResults)
        The Activity's onPermissionResult should call PermissionRequester.onPermissionResult to handle the permission request results NOTE: NEEDS TO BE RE-THOUGHT
        Parameters:
        requestCode - the result Id code
        permissions - the permissions that were asked for
        grantResults - the results of the permission prompt
